conversation_blocks.speaker: alice
conversation_blocks.text: I think this new approach to learning is fascinating.

conversation_blocks.speaker: bob
conversation_blocks.text: I agree with you. Machine learning has incredible potential.

conversation_blocks.speaker: alice
conversation_blocks.text: Exactly! I believe we are seeing the future of education.

conversation_blocks.speaker: bob
conversation_blocks.text: And I think collaborative learning will be key to success.
